Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.game.Game
Direct Known Subclasses:
Game4P
public class Game extends Object
The game class represent the board of the game and contains all the objects that interact with it.

    unifyIsland(Island island1, Island island2)
    Given 2 Islands, unifies them into a single island block and refresh all the references to the old islands, including: - prevIsland and nextIsland of the communicating Islands - motherNature island - game islands list Requires the two islands to be communicating

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      protected Game(GameRules gameRules) throws InvalidNewGameException
      Construct a game without the players inside
      Parameters:
      gameRules - an instance of the gameRules class containing the parameters of the game
      Throws:
      InvalidNewGameException

    • Game

      protected Game(List<PlayerLobby> playersData, GameRules gameRules) throws InvalidNewGameException
      Construct and initialize a player game with no team play
      Parameters:
      playersData - The list of PlayerLobby objects, containing the name of the player and the wizard of the player
      gameRules - the class containing all the parameters for game creation
      Throws:
      InvalidNewGameException

  • Method Details

    • unifyIsland

      public void unifyIsland(Island island1, Island island2)
      Given 2 Islands, unifies them into a single island block and refresh all the references to the old islands, including: - prevIsland and nextIsland of the communicating Islands - motherNature island - game islands list Requires the two islands to be communicating
      Parameters:
      island1 - The island to unify with island2
      island2 - The island to unify with island1

    • professorRelocate

      public void professorRelocate()
      Routine to check and move the professors according to the game rules.

      Routine to refill all the board clouds with students picked from the bag

      Returns:
      the game leaderboard

    • hasProfessor

      public boolean hasProfessor(PawnColor color)
      Returns true if on the board there is a professor of the given color
      Parameters:
      color - The color for the professor to search
      Returns:
      If the professor is on the board

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The professor
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the professor is not on the board
